original_title: Fuzz: The Sound That Revolutionized the World
overview: An in-depth look at the industry of noise making featuring Billy Gibbons, Jon Spencer, J. Mascis  more!  Fuzz... the sound that changed the world. The fuzz box: that tiny  little box between the electric guitar and the amp that  revolutionized rock music.
tagline: The Sound That Revolutionized the World
title: Fuzz: The Sound That Revolutionized the World
